title.value: CapabilityStatement - Birth and Fetal Death Server

description.value: This section describes the expected capabilities of the BFDR Source (aka server) actor which is responsible for sending clinical documentsto a client actor. This CapabilityStatement imports and extends the [us-core-server CapabilityStatement](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CapabilityStatement-us-core-server.html).
